REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f2698 reute r f BC-ELSINORE-<ELS>-MAKES 06-01 0071

TEXT.TITLE: ELSINORE <ELS> MAKES DEPOSIT TO COVER BONDS
TEXT.BODY: Elsinore Corp said it deposited five mln dlrs to cover accrued and unpaid interest through June 30 of the 15-1/2 pct senior mortgage bonds of 1999 of its unit Elsinore Finance Corp. Elsinore has guaranteed the payment of its unit's bonds. The parent deposited the five mln dlrs with Elsinore Finance's trustee, Manufacturers Hanover Trust Co, it said. Reuter
